Chrysler minivans. The redesigned 2011 Chrysler Town& Country and Dodge Grand Caravan have been driving off the assembly line for several weeks, and the vehicles are selling well, Sergio Marchionne has said. I think whenever we launch new products coming out of these plants, we need to be there, said Sergio Marchionne last Wednesday during the North American International Auto Show in Detroit. "I think it's an important recognition of the effort that's gone in here by our colleagues on the shop floor."

Print US ex-defence head Donald Rumsfeld defends Iraq war handling Former US Defence Donald Rumsfeld remains largely defiant about the Iraq war, saying in a new book that had Saddam Hussein remained in power, the Middle East would be far more perilous than it is today. Mr Donald Rumsfeld , 78, has written an autobiography due out next week. He concedes he could have sent more troops, and that internal US rivalries hampered post-war reconstruction. On the question

But, David Vitter said, we want full repeal of Obamacare for a simple reason-- the big problem with the bill, the big problem with the plan aren't at the margins, they are the core, and the big problems can't be fixed with... changing a comma, or changing the punctuation or revising one or two or five or 10 sentences. The big problems are at the core, with the demand that every man, woman and child in the nation has to go onto the market and buy a particular product.
